document.full_text: on a crisp evening last december, romanian transport minister anca boagiu met german investors in the conference room of a hotel in downtown bucharest. a petite woman with dark hair pulled back in a severe bun at the nape of her neck, she was introduced as "the minister in charge of making up for lost time".
document.title: special report: romania's roads to nowhere
lines_and_colors: on a crisp evening last december, romanian transport minister anca boagiu met german investors in the conference room of a hotel in downtown bucharest. a petite woman with dark hair pulled back in a severe bun at the nape of her neck, she was introduced as "the minister in charge of making up for lost time".
